title: Create User List Component
description: Develop UI component for displaying a list of users with filtering, sorting, and pagination capabilities

user_stories: As a service provider, I want to view and manage user profiles so that I can access customer information
As an administrator, I want to see a list of all users so that I can manage the system
business_rules: User list must display key profile information with pagination
User list must support filtering and sorting
User list must follow the design system
User list must handle loading states and error messages
edge_cases: Handling empty user lists and loading states
Managing large user lists with pagination
Processing filter and sort operations efficiently
Displaying user profile information with proper privacy controls

acceptance_criteria: User list component displays users with pagination and filtering
User list component supports sorting by different fields
User list component follows the design system
User list component handles loading states and error conditions properly
User list component integrates with User Management API endpoints

endpoints.description: Get all users with optional filtering and pagination

integration_tests: User list integration with backend APIs
Filtering and sorting with API parameters

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement user list component following Angular best practices. Ensure proper integration with user management API. Implement efficient filtering and sorting.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for user list access. Implement appropriate privacy controls for user information display.
